purpleculture_pinyin:
chóu
(light) silk; Classifiers: 匹
(светлый) шелк; Классификаторы: 匹
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 绸)
Pictophonetic: 周 indicates the sound; 糹 (silk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
綢緞 [ chóu duàn ]: satin; silk fabric
綢繆 [ chóu móu ]: to be sentimentally attached to sb or sth
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 周 [ zhōu ] Zhou dynasty; circumference
heisig_chinese_memo: After Spidey switches from cotton to a silk fabric suit he feels so energetic that he could do laps and laps around the city.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This old lady's favorite thread comes from a silk fabric which she uses to make everything.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "糸" and "周", the original meaning is bondage. "Songs of the Chu‧Nine Songs‧Xiang Jun": "Pulpum cypress comes with silk, and sunrays with orchid." Wang Yi's note: "Silk, bound and bound." "Said Wen": "Miao Ye. Congshi, Zhou Sheng." Duan Yucai's note: "The two meanings of "silk" and "miao" are the same as Miao. Nowadays, the word "silk" and "miao are not used separately."

" Silk " can mean silk. Yuan Sui Jingchen "Shaobian‧The Return of the Gaozu": "The newly brushed headscarf and the silk shirt from Chachan are such a big makeup artist."

" Silk " can lead to " dense ", which means more and dense. "Poetry‧Xiaoya‧People in the Capital": "The children of this gentleman, silk is as straight as hair." Mao Chuan: "It is as straight as hair." Zheng Xuanjian: "Its emotions are dense, and its conduct is upright, like hair has no roots. Long kill also."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "糸" and "周", the original meaning is bondage.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「周」聲，本義為束縛。《楚辭‧九歌‧湘君》：「薜荔柏兮蕙綢，蓀橈兮蘭旌。」王逸注：「綢，縛束也。」《說文》：「繆也。从糸，周聲。」段玉裁注：「綢、繆二義皆與繆同也。今人綢、繆字不分用。」

　　「綢」可表示綢緞。元睢景臣〈哨遍‧高祖還鄉〉：「新刷來的頭巾，恰糨來的綢衫，暢好是粧么大戶。」

　　「綢」可通「稠」，表示多而密。《詩‧小雅‧都人士》：「彼君子女，綢直如髮。」 毛傳：「密直如髮也。」鄭玄箋：「其情性密緻，操行正直，如髮之本末無隆殺也。」

HSK: 5
Chinese: After Spidey switches from cotton to a silk fabric suit he feels so energetic that he could do laps and laps around the city.
Meaning: silk fabric
Hanzi: 绸
Story: This old lady's favorite thread comes from a silk fabric which she uses to make everything.
Kind: traditional

從「 糸 」，「 周 」聲，本義為束縛。《楚辭‧九歌‧湘君》：「薜荔柏兮蕙綢，蓀橈兮蘭旌。」王逸注：「綢，縛束也。」《說文》：「繆也。从糸，周聲。」段玉裁注：「綢、繆二義皆與繆同也。今人綢、繆字不分用。」 「 綢 」可表示綢緞。元睢景臣〈哨遍‧高祖還鄉〉：「新刷來的頭巾，恰糨來的綢衫，暢好是粧么大戶。」 「 綢 」可通「 稠 」，表示多而密。《詩‧小雅‧都人士》：「彼君子女，綢直如髮。」 毛傳：「密直如髮也。」鄭玄箋：「其情性密緻，操行正直，如髮之本末無隆殺也。」
From the sound of " 糸" and " 周", the original meaning is bondage. "Songs of the Chu‧Nine Songs‧Xiang Jun": "Pulpum cypress comes with silk, and sunrays with orchid." Wang Yi's note: "Silk, bound and bound." "Said Wen": "Miao Ye. Congshi, Zhou Sheng." Duan Yucai's note: "The two meanings of "silk" and "miao" are the same as Miao. Nowadays, the word "silk" and "miao are not used separately." " Silk" can mean silk. Yuan Sui Jingchen "Shaobian‧The Return of the Gaozu": "The newly brushed headscarf and the silk shirt from Chachan are such a big makeup artist." " Silk" can lead to " dense", which means more and dense. "Poetry‧Xiaoya‧People in the Capital": "The children of this gentleman, silk is as straight as hair." Mao Chuan: "It is as straight as hair." Zheng Xuanjian: "Its emotions are dense, and its conduct is upright, like hair has no roots. Long kill also."

綢字的基本解释

綢
chóu
见“绸”。

綢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chóu］
［《廣韻》直由切，平尤，澄。］
“绸1”的繁体字。
(1)缠绕。参见“綢繆”。
(2)束缚。
(3)丝织物的通称。
(4)通“稠”。多而密。
[②]［tāo］
［《廣韻》土刀切，平豪，透。］
“绸2”的繁体字。通“韜1”。
缠裹；套。

綢字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　綢； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页926第32
【廣韻】直由切【集韻】陳留切，?音儔。【說文】繆也。【詩·唐風】綢繆束薪。【傳】綢繆，猶纏緜也。　又【詩·小雅】綢直如髮。【傳】密直如髮也。【疏】綢者，綢緻之言，故爲密也。　又【楚辭·九歌】薛荔柏兮蕙綢。【註】綢，縛束也。　又【廣韻】土刀切【集韻】他刀切，?音韜。【禮·檀弓】綢練設旐。【註】以練綢旗之杠。【爾雅·釋天】素錦綢杠。【註】以白地錦韜旗之竿。【前漢·司馬相如傳】靡屈虹而爲綢。【註】綢，韜也。　又【集韻】徒弔切，音調。蜩或从糸。蜩蟉，龍首動貌。

綢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
綢字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chóu］
["Guang Yun" straight from the cut, Ping You, Cheng. ]
Traditional characters for "line 1".
(1) Winding. See "preparation."
(2) Restraint.
(3) Generic term for silk fabric.
(4) Through "thickness". Many and dense.
[②]［tāo］
["Guangyun" soil knife cut, Pinghao, thorough. ]
Traditional characters for "織2". Link "Tao 1".
Wrap around; set.

[Guangyun] Zhiyouqie 【Jiyun】Chen Liuqie, "Yin Jian."
